caption:
In 2020, Aston Villa players gathered around their phones after the full-time whistle to check if they had avoided relegation from the Premier League. 😅

Fast forward to 2025, the Aston Villa squad gathered again after full-time — but this time, to confirm their top 8 finish in the UEFA Champions League standings! 🏆 

What Aston Villa have achieved in this season’s Champions League is simply unbelievable. They finished in the top 8 of the new 36-team league phase — an incredible feat in itself! 🤝

Then, they went on to play in the Champions League quarterfinals, and came so close to qualifying for the semifinals. They even defeated PSG in the second leg of the quarterfinals!

What a journey in just five years. Massive respect to Unai Emery — an underrated mastermind! 🧠
